content: array socks by natural knits pattern description array socks are an easy everyday knit with a bit of texture to keep things interesting built on a simple 3×1 rib they fit well and feel great to wear with a dip stitch detail that looks special without adding complexity inspired by the long colourway changes in blue brick yarns the stitch pattern is quick to memorize and works just as well in solid or variegated yarns letting the yarn do its thing available in both top-down and toe-up these are the kind of socks you can knit on autopilot and still end up with something that feels thoughtful and finished size small medium large finished measurements foot circumference 7 7 8 8 5 inches/ 17 5 19 21 5 cm foot length adjustable choose a size with approximately 1 inch/ 2 5 cm of negative ease in the foot circumference materials yarn the blue brick dyeworks -
